furi_hal_mpu.c

1#include <furi_hal_mpu.h>
2#include <stm32wbxx_ll_cortex.h>
3
4#define FURI_HAL_MPU_ATTRIBUTES \
5 (LL_MPU_ACCESS_BUFFERABLE | LL_MPU_ACCESS_CACHEABLE | LL_MPU_ACCESS_SHAREABLE | \
6 LL_MPU_TEX_LEVEL1 | LL_MPU_INSTRUCTION_ACCESS_ENABLE)
7
8#define FURI_HAL_MPU_STACK_PROTECT_REGION FuriHalMPURegionSize32B
9
10void furi_hal_mpu_init() {
11 furi_hal_mpu_enable();
12
13 // NULL pointer dereference protection
14 furi_hal_mpu_protect_no_access(FuriHalMpuRegionNULL, 0x00, FuriHalMPURegionSize1MB);
15}
16
17void furi_hal_mpu_enable() {
18 LL_MPU_Enable(LL_MPU_CTRL_PRIVILEGED_DEFAULT);
19}
20
21void furi_hal_mpu_disable() {
22 LL_MPU_Disable();
23}
24
25void furi_hal_mpu_protect_no_access(
26 FuriHalMpuRegion region,
27 uint32_t address,
28 FuriHalMPURegionSize size) {
29 uint32_t size_ll = size;
30 size_ll = size_ll << MPU_RASR_SIZE_Pos;
31
32 furi_hal_mpu_disable();
33 LL_MPU_ConfigRegion(
34 region, 0x00, address, FURI_HAL_MPU_ATTRIBUTES | LL_MPU_REGION_NO_ACCESS | size_ll);
35 furi_hal_mpu_enable();
36}
37
38void furi_hal_mpu_protect_read_only(
39 FuriHalMpuRegion region,
40 uint32_t address,
41 FuriHalMPURegionSize size) {
42 uint32_t size_ll = size;
43 size_ll = size_ll << MPU_RASR_SIZE_Pos;
44
45 furi_hal_mpu_disable();
46 LL_MPU_ConfigRegion(
47 region, 0x00, address, FURI_HAL_MPU_ATTRIBUTES | LL_MPU_REGION_PRIV_RO_URO | size_ll);
48 furi_hal_mpu_enable();
49}
50
51void furi_hal_mpu_protect_disable(FuriHalMpuRegion region) {
52 furi_hal_mpu_disable();
53 LL_MPU_DisableRegion(region);
54 furi_hal_mpu_enable();
55}
56
57void furi_hal_mpu_set_stack_protection(uint32_t* stack) {
58 // Protection area address must be aligned to region size
59 uint32_t stack_ptr = (uint32_t)stack;
60 uint32_t mask = ((1 << (FURI_HAL_MPU_STACK_PROTECT_REGION + 2)) - 1);
61 stack_ptr &= ~mask;
62 if(stack_ptr < (uint32_t)stack) stack_ptr += (mask + 1);
63
64 furi_hal_mpu_protect_read_only(
65 FuriHalMpuRegionStack, stack_ptr, FURI_HAL_MPU_STACK_PROTECT_REGION);
66}
